text: The Men's 100 metres C5 was a track event in athletics at the 1992 Summer Paralympics, for visually impaired athletes. It consisted of a single race."Barcelona 1992 Paralympic Games: Athletics: Men's 100 m C5" , International Paralympic Committee ==Results== ===Final=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" |- ! title: Athletics at the 1992 Summer Paralympics – Men's 100 metres C5
